reviewText: Attempting to be educational, this video falls short with a story about neither love, nor real friendship, but a poor  story of opposites. The children were not interested past the commercial recognition of the obnoxious Martin Short character.
Only one short story is about Valentine's Day.  It's not what I had in mind.  I was hoping for a more 'Valentine' themed video.
bought this for my niece.  she loved it.  to tell you the truth, the adults in my family like Dr. Seuss.  timeless books.
Our Granddaughter loves books and this was a great value for Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That: Hurray! It's Valentine's Day.

I bought three of these for some of my younger grandchildren for Valentine's day.  The price was great (I have 9 grandchildren to buy gifts for) and they all enjoyed it.  It is hard to beat Dr. Seuss.
My 2 1/2 y.o. daughter loves all the episodes, this one is just as great as the others. Very funny and educational.
I was not there when granddaughter opened this gift, but my son told me she loved it!  I would suggest to any grandparent as a fitting gift.it again.
We purchased the DVD The Cat in the Hat Knows A Lot About That: Hurray It's Valentine's Day.  This DVD is a great addition to our children's seasonal DVD library collection.  Thank you so much.
love it
If you're looking for something Valentine related, save your money.  The Valentine bit is very short.
Love it for grandsons

I personally love the Cat in the Hat shows for my children.  However, for some reason the kids couldn't really enjoy this one all the way through.  It is really, really short so I'm glad I got it on sale.  Normally when I get these I try to get ones that are at least 45 minutes to 60 minutes long.  There isn't a lot about Valentine's Day which is OK with us because the kids like to watch it other times of the year as well.  Overall, though, it's pretty good.  The kids will sit and watch this one for at least half the time. ;)
Fun cute movie for Valentines day.
Love this video.  Your children will love it!
Cute DVD
Great!
awesome book
loved it

We love cat in the hat! Be aware though this isn't really a Valentine's special movie like I had hoped (the Halloween one is one of my toddlers favorites year round- I was looking forward to it being like that and the Xmas one where it's a holiday related adventure). This only the intro is Valentine's-y and then it's episodes from the tv show.

My great nephew loved the video.  His mama tried to snap his photo for me after he got his valentines package I ordered from Amazon for him.  He was smiling in the pic but his eyes were side ways because he couldn't stop watching this movie!
Nice book! Great quality
Good bok
My sons preschool class loved this.
My son loves it
So cute! My child took this to school for a Valentine's Day party and all the kids enjoyed it.
